resumen: We are looking for AWS, Azure, GCP and Databricks Data Engineers to join the PYXIS [...]
descripcion_detallada: We are looking for talents who:
requisitos: +2 years of experience in Data Engineer/Data Analyst roles working on projects with technologies such as: Python, PySpark and SQL/T-SQL (or similar).
+2 years of experience working on AWS, Azure, GCP or Databricks cloud solutions/environments.
valorables: AWS, Azure, GCP or Databricks Certifications.

experience working with any of the following services/solutions will be a plus:
AWS: Redshift, QuickSight, Kinesis, Athena, S3, Sagemaker, DataZone, DynamoDB, Glue, DMS, Lake Formation, Lambda and Step Functions.
Azure: Microsoft Fabric, Power BI, Microsoft Analysis Services, Synapse Analytics, Data Explorer, Data Factory, Azure Streaming Analytics, ADLS Gen2, Azure Synapse SQL Dedicated Pools and Azure Functions.
GCP: Looker, BigQuery, Dataflow, BigTable, Spanner, Dataproc, Dataprep, Data Fusion and Composer.
Databricks: Lakeflow Jobs (workflows), Delta Live Tables, Databricks SQL, Data Science & ML, Unity Catalog and Delta Lake.

Graduated with a degree in Computer Engineering or a Bachelor’s Degree in Systems.
